snippet: Duchene had a franchise-record 11 goals in November and opened the scoring for Colorado on Tuesday.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Colorado Avalanche beats New Jersey Devils, 2-1; other pro hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Duchene had a franchise-record 11 goals in November and opened the scoring for Colorado on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Hot Scorer Leads Avalanche Past the Devils
headline.main: Hot-Scoring Matt Duchene Leads Avalanche Past the Devils
